::Enertron::
    He watched Galvatron leave and his heart sank.  He had failed.  He would 
have to try again.  But not now.  He went and picked up his arm using some 
energy to begin repairs on it.  He used his wings to fly to a small deserted 
island.  There he sat contemplating the battle and repairing his charred arm.
